#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Configuration
SOURCE="/home/user/data"
BACKUP_DIR="/backup"
DATE=$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S)
LATEST="$BACKUP_DIR/latest"
CURRENT="$BACKUP_DIR/$DATE"

# Create backup
if [ -d "$LATEST" ]; then
    # Incremental backup using hard links
    rsync -av --delete --link-dest="$LATEST" "$SOURCE/" "$CURRENT/"
else
    # First backup
    rsync -av "$SOURCE/" "$CURRENT/"
fi

# Update latest symlink
rm -f "$LATEST"
ln -s "$CURRENT" "$LATEST"

echo "Backup completed: $CURRENT"
EOF

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Configuration
SOURCE="/var/www/myapp"
REMOTE_USER="backup"
REMOTE_HOST="backup-server.example.com"
REMOTE_DIR="/backups/$(hostname)"
LOG_FILE="/var/log/rsync-backup.log"
EXCLUDE_FILE="/etc/rsync-exclude.txt"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $*" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

log "=== Starting backup ==="
log "Source: $SOURCE"
log "Destination: $REMOTE_USER@$REMOTE_HOST:$REMOTE_DIR"

# Perform backup
if rsync -avz --delete \
    --exclude-from="$EXCLUDE_FILE" \
    --partial --progress \
    --stats \
    -e "ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" \
    "$SOURCE/" \
    "$REMOTE_USER@$REMOTE_HOST:$REMOTE_DIR/" \
    >> "$LOG_FILE" 2>&1; then
    log "SUCCESS: Backup completed"
    exit 0
else
    log "ERROR: Backup failed!"
    # Send alert email
    echo "Backup failed for $(hostname)" | mail -s "Backup Failure" admin@example.com
    exit 1
fi
EOF
